trans-unit.source: Represents the visual behavior that occurs when a control transitions from one state to another.
trans-unit.target: 表示當控制項從某個狀態到另一個轉換，就會發生的視覺行為。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the visual behavior of a control when it transitions between states by adding VisualTransition objects.
trans-unit.target: 藉由新增 VisualTransition 狀態之間轉換時，您可以指定控制項的視覺行為。

trans-unit.source: When you create a VisualTransition, you specify one or more of the following: - The time it takes for a transition between states to occur by setting the <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.GeneratedDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 VisualTransition 時，您會指定一或多個項目:-設定發生狀態之間的轉換所花費的時間<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.GeneratedDuration%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.GeneratedDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Additional changes in the control's appearance that occur at the time of the transition by setting the <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.Storyboard%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -其他控制項的外觀變更發生在轉換時，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.Storyboard%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the VisualTransition is applied by setting the <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.To%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.From%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -藉由設定套用 VisualTransition 時<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.To%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.From%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.From%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.To%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.VisualTransition"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> to transition from.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>從轉換。

trans-unit.source: The From property is optional.
trans-unit.target: From 屬性是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> can be restricted to apply to only certain states or it can be applied any time the control transitions between states.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>可以限制套用至只有某些狀態，或它可以套用任何時候控制項之間的轉換狀態。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>

trans-unit.source: You restrict when a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> is applied by setting the <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.To%2A> and From properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以限制何時<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>藉由設定套用<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.To%2A>及內容。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.To%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the levels of restriction from most restrictive to least restrictive.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述到最不嚴格的限制最嚴格的層級。

trans-unit.source: |Type of restriction|Value of From|Value of To| |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |From a specified state to another specified state|The name of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>|The name of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>| |From any state to a specified state|Not set|The name of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>| |From a specified state to any state|The name of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>|Not set| |From any state to any other state|Not set|Not set| You can have multiple <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> that refer to the same state, but they will be used in the order that the previous table specifies.
trans-unit.target: |類型的限制 |值從 |結果值 | |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |從指定的狀態到另一個特定狀態 |<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>名稱 |<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>名稱 | |從任何狀態變更為指定的狀態 |未設定 |<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>名稱 | |從指定的狀態，變更任何狀態 |<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>名稱 |未設定 | |從任何狀態變更為其他任何狀態 |未設定 |未設定 | 您可以有多個<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>中的物件<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>，參考相同的狀態，但它們將會使用上表所指定的順序。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> </xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: You can change this behavior by creating a new class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> and overriding the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更此行為，藉由建立新的類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>和覆寫<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> to transition from.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>從轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time that it takes to move from one state to another.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從某一個狀態移到另一個的時間。

trans-unit.source: You can specify how long a transition takes by setting the GeneratedDuration property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定多久轉換會藉由設定 GeneratedDuration 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you set the GeneratedDuration property, you are specifying the time that it takes for the transition to occur.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定 GeneratedDuration 屬性時，您將指定進行轉換所花費的時間。

trans-unit.source: The time that it takes to move from one state to another.
trans-unit.target: 從某一個狀態移到另一個時間。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom mathematical formula that is used to transition between states.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂的數學公式會使用狀態之間轉換。

trans-unit.source: You can set the GeneratedEasingFunction property to specify the way a transition occurs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定 GeneratedEasingFunction 屬性來指定發生轉換的方式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify an easing function to accelerate or decelerate the transition.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定要加速或減速轉換 easing 函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Easing Functions](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Easing 函式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A custom mathematical formula that is used to transition between states.
trans-unit.target: 自訂數學公式用於狀態之間轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that occurs when the transition occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> ，會在轉換時發生。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> runs any time the <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>包含<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>執行任何時間<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>套用。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want the border of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> to change colors when the user moves the mouse away from it, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> that has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that changes the button's background.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要的框線<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>若要變更色彩，使用者移動滑鼠離開它時，您可以建立<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>變更按鈕的背景。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that occurs when the transition occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> ，會在轉換時發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>轉換。

trans-unit.source: The To property is optional.
trans-unit.target: To 屬性是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> can be restricted to apply to only certain states or it can be applied any time the control transitions between states.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>可以限制套用至只有某些狀態，或它可以套用任何時候控制項之間的轉換狀態。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>

trans-unit.source: You restrict when a <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> is applied by setting the To and <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.From%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以限制何時<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>套用藉由設定 收件者和<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.From%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition.From%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the levels of restriction from most restrictive to least restrictive.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述到最不嚴格的限制最嚴格的層級。

trans-unit.source: |Type of restriction|Value of From|Value of To| |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |From a specified state to another specified state|The name of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>|The name of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>| |From any state to a specified state|Not set|The name of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>| |From a specified state to any state|The name of a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>|Not set| |From any state to any other state|Not set|Not set| You can have multiple <xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> that refer to the same state, but they will be used in the order that the previous table specifies.
trans-unit.target: |類型的限制 |值從 |結果值 | |-------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |從指定的狀態到另一個特定狀態 |<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>名稱 |<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>名稱 | |從任何狀態變更為指定的狀態 |未設定 |<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>名稱 | |從指定的狀態，變更任何狀態 |<xref:System.Windows.VisualState>名稱 |未設定 | |從任何狀態變更為其他任何狀態 |未設定 |未設定 | 您可以有多個<xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition>中的物件<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>，參考相同的狀態，但它們將會使用上表所指定的順序。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> </xref:System.Windows.VisualTransition> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: You can change this behavior by creating a new class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> and overriding the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以變更此行為，藉由建立新的類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>和覆寫<xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.GoToStateCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> to transition to.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>轉換。
